title: Aurelion Sol Skin ideas
body: How cool would it be to have aurelion sol be a unicorn? We have him leave a rainbow trail as he moves and builds his e. Have his starts that follow him be either clouds or stars similar to the star guardians wars. His q can be a smaller cartoon looking unicorn and his ult should be similar to lux where he spits out a rainbow. Also a Chinese New Years skin for him would be cool as well. Something similar to the kogmaw where he is the Chinese New Years parade dragon.

replies.body:
Kinda sounds like a reference to a certain adventurous cartoon show. :P

Good ideas in here, so you should definitely post it to the [*Concepts & Creations Boards*](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts) so it can get far more visibility and discussion.

Let me know if you have any questions.
i like the chinese new years skin idea
